ing.item: Ripe Plum tomatoes; peeled and seeded

directions.step:
From: "Lisabeth Crawford (Pooh)" <104105.1416@compuserve.com> Heat the oil in a large saucepan over medium heat. SAute the onion and garlic until soft, about 5 minutes. Add the tomatoes, sugar, salt, and pepper to taste. Simmer for 30 minutes, until thickened, stirring often to break up the tomatoes.
Nutritional info per serving: 128 cal; 3g pro, 22g cab, 4g fat (28%) Exchanges: 3.4 veg, .1 bread, .7 fat
